attributes.action: Provide an annual well publicised list which rates the cleanliness of NHS hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The state of the nhs is disgusting it is past pouring money into the system but spending the money given well on less management and administration and more on hands-on cleaning staff and cleaning inspectors. Basic rules need to be applied and met and if they are not met then staff should be sacked and replaced. It is a governments responsibility to protect and look after it's people.
